actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1257.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7668 to strengthen the system of congressional oversight of the intelligence activities of the United States.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7668 (Congressional oversight of intelligence activities).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7668 to strengthen the system of congressional oversight of the intelligence activities of the United States.
